description:
Welcome to the official FREE app for Coventry - Olympic co-host City selected to be the Midlands Venue for Olympic Football in 2012.
 
Discover and keep up-to-date with what's happening in Coventry and the surrounding area during London 2012.
 
Football - Hosting Olympic Football at the Ricoh Arena, (to be renamed the City of Coventry Stadium for the Games) 12 matches over 8 days finishing with the Women's bronze medal match.
 
Games - results, fixtures, team news  and information on the Men's and Women's Olympic Football Games.

Olympic Events - Discover what other major Olympic Events are taking place including the Torch Relay, London 2012 Live Site, Coventry Cathedral 50th Anniversary celebrations, Godiva Awakes Cultural Olympiad project and the World Shakespeare Festival 2012. 

Visit Us - Explore famous attractions and landmarks in Coventry and Warwickshire. 

Events - Find out regular events information via RSS feed – providing the very latest on what to do and see in Coventry and Warwickshire. 

Info - Detailed tourist and business information. 

Get Around - How to get around the area.

This is a live app and requires a 3G or WiFi connection.
